Articles.Content: I recently attempted a rendezvous mission, and while I was getting into orbit. I was definitely closer than 100km to my target, but the grey/pink target reticule didn\'t appear. I actually did complete the rendezvous without it (pro-mode activate =P), but it is a rather dangerous bug and decided to put it up for your assistance. Any thoughts?

Look in your settings and check for the reticule to turn on. It is off by default.

Gook with that advice
Also, there\'s a toggle key you may have accidentally pressed, that enables/disables the markers.
